name: I've been struggling with depression for some time now.
name_original: I've been struggling with depression for some time now.
description:
A game about a man handling a traumatic experience.

Make sure to turn on your sound to have the full experience!

Designed for the Unreal intro Game Jam - Week 2

Broken-English Voice-over done by: Lucas Dane

Game made by: Lucas Dane // 200194

Assets used:
